title: [SysPipeliners] Support the Golive of the FIB-tool
description:
Business Scope:
As a business epic owner I want the FIB tool to be accepted in a Business User Test and be prepared for the Golive
acceptance_criteria: The FIB tool is deployed in UAT and ready to be tested
A migration test in done in UAT
Interface Agreements are up to date and ready to be signed
Testcases are in place to support the BUT
a rolloutplan is ready to be executed in July including migration from CPQ
